section.name: Contributing to JGroups
section.p:
There are various ways to contribute:
If you find a bug, please either fix it (best case !) and send a patch, or at least create a bug report so we know about the bug. If you find that you fix a number of bugs, we may promote you to CVS committer (if you want to), so that you can fix bugs directly.
Write some documentation. Example: how to set up JGroups using JBuilder, or how to configure JGroups on a NIC-less notebook
Create unit tests. These are very essential: we run the testcase suite before each new release to make sure previously fixed bugs don't show up again. Having a lot of unit tests helps us save time.
Suggest new features
